firstParagraph: I'm huge passionate about digital and analog photography!
secondParagraph: What I love the most about it is that you have possibility to show to others, how you see the world that is surrounding you. Not just effects bring pleasure to me, but the whole process of creation.
thirdParagraph: In my projects I focus mostly on landscapes, sports, cities and lifestyle. I'm trying to blur the boundaries between calm nature and noisy metropolises. The freshest photos you can find on my regularly updated accounts on
fourthParagraph: I'm willing to collaborate in fresh, interesting projects. If you are interested in cooperation, just contact me using one of given options
